name: superparent-reward-tracker
description: Secure parent-only task and reward tracker for kids with high-reliability SQLite persistence.

scripts.build: mkdir -p www && cp index.html index.js App.js constants.js manifest.json sw.js metadata.json www/ && mkdir -p www/services && cp services/storage.js www/services/ 2>/dev/null || :
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
